transArray.content:
The room during this trip exceeded my expectations and I am very satisfied:
1. Newly renovated, the rooms are very new, very clean, and soundproofed
2. I am very satisfied with the breakfast buffet. There are many varieties and the taste is very good. I got up early to try it and I am satisfied with it.
3. There is a dedicated laundry room that integrates washing and drying, and can also be ironed, which is satisfactory
4. Due to travel issues, check-out was delayed. The boss was very nice and delayed the check-out by 2 points.

All in all, it's very good. Friends who need it can book a stay.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
